QuestData.Title: Comin' Round the Mountain
QuestData.Description: The mountain pass is very dangerous. You need much luck to survive. Nephew Bentnail will show you the way.$b$bPerhaps today is a lucky day to travel though. Wind blows from the east; this is good sign. Grummles always travel best when east wind blows.$b$bClimb in the cart when you are ready to leave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the cart and guides safely up Neverest Mountain.
QuestData.RewardText: You've arrived just in time, $c! I was starting to think I would die up here!
